title: Evaluation of the potential of Yushina alpina bamboo fibers from Cameroon for the manufacture of biocomposites
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Japhet Noubiap Ngouobe, Thibaut Lecompte, Paul Salomon Ngohe-Ekam, Landry Herv√© Penlap, Micheal Tiendjou Tiombou, Barnabas Neba Nfornkah, Pierre Meukam, Abraham Kanmogne, Jean Nganhou, Jean-luc Bailleul, Antoine Kervoelen, Adrien Simplice Towa, Marcel Bertrand Hagbe Ntod, Ivo Takwe Tebo, Bapetel Djaratou Bouba, Matthias Beyrle
